author: Special Correspondent
text:
Case registered against realtor

Othakadai police have registered a case of cheating against a real estate promoter at Tirumoogur on a charge of cheating a customer by not handing over the house for which he had taken Rs. 18.50 lakh in 2013.

The police said that D. Sivaganesh had availed the services of realtor P. Kamaraj of Uthangudi for constructing a house measuring 1,278 square feet for Rs. 19.24 lakh. Sivaganesh had paid Rs. 18.50 lakh in August 2013. While the promoter had promised to hand over the house in January 2014, he did not keep his word till date.

The customer, in his complaint, claimed that the promoter had threatened him when he repeatedly asked for early completion of the house.
title: Cheating case against private builder
